comment: Ok, its clear. Good head retention. Hoppy aroma but has a cidery smell to it but not in an acidic sense. Just really fruity. Carbonation and mouthfeel are actually on point but the taste. Its a tad to bitter for a pale and just an odd pairing of flavors. I get some oniony taste that I thought I might dig, I do not. A little astringent. Lingering bitterness. Not a fan.
Pear, it smells like pears. not cider. still dont like it
